item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.description:
Hello Folks, I am Nirmal Unagar

Today I am writing my first blog so please bear with me for my English skills :)

In this blog, I will tell you how to get anyone’s location using the tool Seeker. Without further ado, let’s start…

I’m dividing this blog into different steps so you can follow along easily.

Step 1: Download and Install Seeker Link to heading

First, you need to download the Seeker tool from the link below:

item.title: A Bit About Me...
item.description:
Cybersecurity professional with expertise in Elasticsearch SIEM, Logpoint SIEM, and Fortigate Firewall. Successfully reduced cyber threats, optimised security infrastructure, and led migration initiatives. Holder of MSC in Computer Forensics & Cybersecurity.
